venue.address_2: see map at end of announcement
venue.name: Building 4, Room 370

item.description:
Please RSVP!




Fifth Anniversary Meeting!
Please bring food, non-alcoholic drinks, cups, plates or ice! We will use the first 45 minutes of the meeting to celebrate the fifth anniversary. All the presentations will be shortened to fit. We will eat in the lounge area outside Room 315.



TITLE: CAN SLIM (TM) and Investing the IBD (TM) Way: What it is, why it works and how to use it - by Mike Kinkead

DESCRIPTION: Mike continues his series on investing the IBD way using William J. O'Neil's CAN SLIMÂ® approach. Investing is about playing the probabilities. Thanks to O'Neil, we know what these probabilities are and how to use them to select winning stocks.

This talk is part of a series of interactive talks with Mike Kinkead at the Wednesday Boston IBD Meetup. Everyone is encouraged to contribute his or her experience and expertise to the discussion.

Market Talk led by Doug Roberts

Doug has delivered his Market Talk ever since we moved to MIT. The banter in our group of bulls versus bears has become vigorous as the market alternately rallies and tumbles. Join this discussion as Doug gives his perspective on fundamentals, technicals and sentiment. Doug is one of the leaders of the group and is a full-time trader.

BOSTON TIGER PRE-MEETING Announcement:
The Boston Tiger Meeting of the Tiger Financial Network meets starting at 5:30 PM to get more meat into the meetings. Go to http://www.tfnn.com/b... to see the full announcement. For questions, see Bob Podd at bpodd@softwareresults.com. The meeting is the same room as the 7:00 meeting.

The agenda for the meetup will be:
6:00 - 6:50 Pre-Meeting with Boston Tigers, led by Bob Podd
7:00 Introduction, Announcements, Polls by Doug
Market Talk and Discussion led by Doug
Stockpicks led by Chris
CAN SLIM (TM) and Investing the IBD (TM) Way: What it is, why it works and how to use it led by Mike

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

In order to identify people who evidence expertise in particular interests we have virtual trading.
To join in our virtual trading, go to this link for instructions and signup links:
http://groups.google....

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Fifth Anniversary Boston Investor's Business Daily Meeting
